data.title: Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies
meta_keywords: The Ryoichi Sasakawa Young Leaders Fellowship Fund Program
data.meta_description: The Ryoichi Sasakawa Young Leaders Fellowship Fund (Sylff) Program supports students pursuing graduate degrees in the humanities and social sciences at 69 world-leading institutions of higher learning in 44 countries.
data.text:
Program Description

The program aims at supporting the education of outstanding postgraduate students with high potential for future leadership, both in public life and private endeavors. Depending on the year, one or two PhD students receive a grant for research in the field of international relations or development studies.

*For details and updates, please refer to the Sylff institution's website listed above.
